comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4673?focusedCommentId=16777312) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] replied on the mailing list "It might be nice to do this as a Gmock matcher instead of a separate macro"

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4673?focusedCommentId=16790626) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
We will need `ToString` methods for every sub-objects to use Matchers. A second note on this, while debugging it's _very_ handy if the Matcher can pin-point the exact reason, e.g. row, where the miss-match happens.
